Posted By: annenoise (11/4/2010 9:22:53 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I think the reason he's 2B is because he's a zombie. you'll notice many zombie cards seem overpriced. that's most likely due to the fact that they have many tribal and graveyard benefits that other tribes don't have. like ghoulcaller's chant and call to the grave, these cards have built-in benefits that you pay for in an extra colorless or sometimes two, depending on the card...that's just my look on it anyway.
